name: Shinmax Bike Helmet for Men Women, Bicycle Helmet with Detachable Magnetic Goggles Adjustable for Adult Road Biking Mountain Cycling Helmet (BC-001)
short_description: 【Safety Protection】- Shinmax bike helmets with tough and poly-carbonate shell and EPS foam, helps slow down the impact and provide your head with maximum protection and comfortability in all directions during crash.

【Adjustable Size & Quick Release System】Cycling helmet can be adjusted to fit different head circumferences 22.05"-24.41" (56cm-62cm) for both adult men and women. Both the back regulator and side straps are adjustable. Quick-release buckle makes the helmet cycling easier to put on or take off your adult bike helmet.

【Detachable Magnetic Goggles】- Unique magnetic visor shield design can be used as sunglasses, not only protect your face against wind and sand, but also block the strong ultraviolet light, UV400 protection. Bicycle helmet with 3 strong magnet, make the goggles shield can be flipped up or down.

【Ventilation 7 Holes】- Streamlined design, adult helmet in special aerodynamic design and 7 breathable vets, effectively reduce air resistance and reduce sweating. Super lightweight 310g (0.68 lb) bike helmet no more burden, keep staying cool and comfortable.
【Gifts for Adult】- The bike helmet adult is protective and ideal for urban commuting, cycling, skateboarding; also suitable for city, road, electric, trek bike and etc.

name: KASK Mistral Bike Helmet I Aerodynamic, Track Cycling, Crono & Triathlon Helmet
short_description: AERODYNAMIC: The Mistral helmet is an extremely aerodynamic helmet that cleverly conceals six front openings and two rear ones, the design includes extended inner channeling which gives the track cycling, crono, or triathlete rider continuous comfort thanks to in-molding technology.

COMFORT PERFORMANCE: Within the outer shell of the Mistral there is 3D dry padding to securely fit and protect the rider; with a self-adjusting lateral divider and faux leather chinstrap, this helmet offers comfort and performance in equal measure.
MAGNETIC VISOR SYSTEM: Innovative magnetic visor integrated into the helmet by use of 5 magnetic system which ensures optimal air flow and increased aerodynamics.
3D DRY PADDING: Tridimensional padding utilizes a multi-layer open cell construction process; this technology ensures high performance and comfort. Inner padding is removable and washable.

KASK: Established in 2004 and based in Italy, Kask is widely distinguished for its achievements in producing the perfect balance between technological excellence, functionality, attractive design while maintaining a commitment to the highest standards in safety helmet production.

MIPS C2 rotational management system is engineered to add protection in case of certain impacts
Exceptionally comfortable and secure on the head thanks to refined internal shape

360° head belt, and vertical and occipital adjustments offer a customized fit
rating: Previous page of related Sponsored Products

name: Retrospec Lennon Bike Helmet with LED Safety Light Adjustable Dial & Removable Visor
short_description: ALL-AROUND HELMET: Keep your head cool in our ergonomic Lennon Helmet. The removable visor and premium padding will get you to your destination in style and comfort. Go from entry level bike rider to serious cyclist with the switch of a helmet!

PREMIUM VENTILATION: Our classic cyclist helmet has 15 vents with inside air-channels to keep you cool and comfortable for a casual ride or a long day on your bike. The removable padding can be washed and provides optimal cushion for a long ride.
ADJUSTABLE FIT: A well-fitted helmet is a safe helmet. Use the ErgoKnob-2 dial-fit adjustment system to get the perfect fit! The Lennon fits heads between 54-61 cm/21.25-24 in (universal fit).

SAFETY FIRST: Let drivers, pedestrians and other cyclists know your there with our built-in 5-LED safety light on the back of helmet. With 3 functions and a long-lasting battery, the Lennon will keep you seen and safe on the road.
BRIGHT COLORS: Pick from a variety of bright colors to perfectly accent your bike and augment your personality.

name: Kask, Nirvana Helmet
short_description: ELITE RACING PERFORMANCE: The Nirvana cycling helmet is engineered for roadies, triathletes, and pistards, featuring superior aerodynamic efficiency with a 35% reduction in drag and exceptional ventilation, providing unmatched speed, safety, breathability, and racing performance.

INNOVATIVE DESIGN & FIT: The Nirvana’s aerodynamic shell is tested in wind tunnels for peak performance and provides an impressive CX rate. The ergonomic neck support ensures a fast and secure fit against the back of the head, and the redesigned vertical stabilizer offers a customized fit, ideal for riders with longer hair. The thoughtfully designed eyewear port seamlessly integrates form and function.

ADVANCED VENTILATION & COOLING: Experience optimal thermoregulation with strategically placed vents that channel air efficiently, and the innovative Hyvent structure designed to maximize airflow and thermal regulation of the rider's head; whatever the position the head will assume the outflow of air will be perfectly in line with the helmet. It delivers a 19% increase in airflow to keep you cool and comfortable even during the most intense moments in the saddle.

ENHANCED SAFETY FEATURES: Equipped with KASK’s proprietary Multipod, a 3D-printed padding strengthens the helmet against linear and rotational impacts. The OCTOFIT+ retention system with a new over-injected rubber dial provides a finely tuned fit for enhanced safety and stability. A reflective graphic at the back boosts high visibility for the rider to ensure added safety on the road.

KASK: Established in 2004 and based in Italy, Kask is widely distinguished for its achievements in producing the perfect balance between technological excellence, functionality, and attractive design while maintaining a commitment to the highest standards in safety helmet production.

name: ABUS Gamechanger 2.0 MIPS Bike Helmet - Aerodynamic Road Cycling, Gravel Biking and Cyclocross Helmet - Shiny White, Large
short_description: Aerodynamic Excellence, Redesigned: The ABUS GameChanger 2.0 redefines airflow with its updated aerodynamic profile, cutting through wind with unmatched efficiency. Whether you're sprinting on flat terrain or climbing steep inclines, this helmet reduces drag so your energy goes where it counts — forward.

Lightweight Protection, Proven Performance: Built with Multi Shell In-Mold construction, the GameChanger 2.0 delivers uncompromising safety without the bulk. You’ll feel confident and agile, knowing you’re protected by a helmet trusted by pro teams.

Precision Fit: Featuring ABUS’s Zoom Ace adjustable retention system, this helmet offers a dialed-in, customizable fit that stays secure even in aggressive riding positions. Ride harder, corner sharper, and sprint faster with a helmet that moves with you, not against you.

Ventilation Meets Speed: Equipped with the AirBoost ventilation system, this helmet balances performance and comfort by maintaining optimal airflow without sacrificing aerodynamics. Say goodbye to overheating during long summer rides and hello to a cooler, faster ride.

Sleek Style, Pro-Level Credibility: From the WorldTour to your local route, the Gamechanger 2.0 blends high-performance function with sleek, minimalist aesthetics. Available in a range of colors to suit your kit, it’s a statement of speed, style, and cycling ambition.
product_description: The new ABUS GameChanger 2.0 MIPS is the ultimate aerodynamic helmet for performance road cycling – developed in cooperation with Movistar Team. With its Multi Position Design the GameChanger completely re-defines aerodynamics as every airflow is optimized for real race conditions. The Forced Air Cooling Technology ensures a comfortable head temperature is maintained whilst the ABUS Multi Shell In Mold construction provides the highest level of protection.

name: OutdoorMaster Gem Recreational MIPS Cycling Helmet - Two Removable Liners & Ventilation in Multi-Environment - Bike Helmet in Mountain, Motorway for Youth & Adult
short_description: MIPS Safety: The Mips system is designed to provide added safety for helmets in many accidents. For certain impacts, the system can reduce harmful rotational forces
Double Adjustment: 2 different thicknesses liners(0.23 & 0.31 inch) and the adjustment dial maximize the head fit, flexibly adapted to different kinds of cycling glasses and avoid pulling hair
Comfortable: The removable visor and the skin-friendly adjustable chin strap offers comfortable wearing and better fit better
A Helmet For Multi-Sport: Equipped with 25 individual vents for next-level ventilation for better experience when skating, cycling, BMX, MTB and more
What You Get: 1 x OutdoorMaster MIPS bike helmet, 2 x liners, OutdoorMaster's friendly customer service

name: KASK Mojito3 Helmet I Road, Gravel and Commute Biking Helmet
short_description: DESIGN: For gravel, and road riders looking to stay cool with an optimized vent system for increased airflow, lightweight protection, signature front lines, classic rounded lower shell and an iconic tail.

ADVANCED SAFETY & PROTECTION: Rotational Impact WG11 approved, the invisible layer of protection far exceeds international norms and surpasses the highest safety performance standards against rotational impacts. High visibility stickers ensure maximum safety in low light and poor visibility conditions.
VENTILATION: Enhanced ventilation system on the front, crest, and back of the helmet capture airflow and actively pass it through the interior channels to ensure optimal ventilation.

COMFORT OCTO FIT: The Mojito3 sports an "Octo" rubberized micro dial adjuster that provides easy mid-ride adjustments, while its contact points with gel pads prove to further enhance comfort. The helmet’s supports oscillate freely through 180 degrees, which makes achieving a perfect fit a refreshingly simple process.

KASK: Established in 2004 and based in Italy, Kask is widely distinguished for its achievements in producing the perfect balance between technological excellence, functionality, attractive design while maintaining a commitment to the highest standards in safety helmet production.

VENTILATION: 18 Wind Tunnel vents with internal channeling.

UNIVERSAL FIT SIZING: Get the right fit, straight out of the box.
product_description: Top-level mountain biking styling at a value price with all the features needed to conquer fire road adventures and swooping singletrack trails.
